data.title: Cornwall Health Library
data.meta_description: Published papers by staff from CFT, RCHT, KCCG, and local GPs.
data.text:
Research repository

Published papers by staff from CFT, RCHT, KCCG and GP practices. If there is a paper that you would like to see added, please contact the library.

Access to some of these resources may require an OpenAthens account. See our OpenAthens page for details on how to apply for one.

Bold indicates local authors.
